spatial_accuracy.notes: General floor plan layout is preserved and room adjacencies are correct. However, door orientations in several rooms (specifically bedrooms 2 and 3) are mirrored or incorrectly swung. Window proportions across the right facade are inconsistent with the 2D dimensions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Significant violation of the 'no text' constraint: the 3D model contains gibberish text labels that mimic the 2D floor plan. While rooms are present, the text/UI overlay is a major breach of the aesthetic and structural brief.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement effectively follows the plan (sofas, tables, beds align well). Deductions for scale issues in the kitchen counters and the hallucinated double-sink features mismatched with the original symbols.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Failed 'no photorealism/no texture' requirement. The render utilizes soft-shadow ambient occlusion and realistic texturing (carpets, wood grain, tile patterns) instead of the requested flat low-poly style. Text labels further degrade the isometric aesthetic.

detected_errors.description: Failure to remove text labels and measurements; gibberish text renders across all floor surfaces.
Style violation: Render uses textures and complex lighting/shadows instead of low-poly flat shading.
Hallucinated elements: Additional lighting fixtures and decorative floor rugs added that were not in the 2D layout.
Layout distortion in door swing directions for Bed Room 2 and Bed Room 3.
